name:
Super Mario Bros.™
Deluxe
description:
This souped-up version of the all-time classic was a big hit on Game Boy™ Color. Super Mario Bros. Deluxe features all 32 original levels from the 1985 classic, plus a whole lot more!

In Challenge mode, revisit classic levels and collect special red coins and Yoshi eggs to beat the high score. Or race against a familiar foe through eight special courses in You Vs Boo mode! There are even challenging secret levels to be discovered, for a true test of your Super Mario Bros. skills!
disclaimer:
If you participated in the Join
Nintendo Network Promotion, please
remember to check your email to get
your free download code for Super
Mario Bros.™ Deluxe.
